extendedInfo.description: Send cat facts quickly and easily to your friends!  Working the dog facts angle?  Plenty of those too!  You can also find amazing facts on birds, dinosaurs, and fish!Well over 600 different animal facts make this one of the largest collections available!Easy to navigate and use interface, facts are separated by animal / group, and can be viewed in order, or randomly.Send your favorite facts as a text with the push of a button and you can easily edit and modify any message before hitting send.Appropriate for all ages, these facts can even be used as a learning tool.

reviews.comment: Get app and fun for the whole family!
reviews.author: A Google User
